mariana_snailfish.simple_script: I am the deepest swimming fish in the whole ocean! I look like a pink tadpole.
mariana_snailfish.detailed_script: I'm a Mariana Snailfish! It has transparent skin that lets you see its liver!

giant_tube_worm.name_script: Giant Tube Worm! Starts with G!
giant_tube_worm.simple_script: I have no mouth and no tummy! I live near hot underwater volcanoes.
giant_tube_worm.detailed_script: I'm a Giant Tube Worm! They survive on chemicals from the Earth's core, not sunlight.

comb_jelly.simple_script: I don't sting like a jellyfish. I have rainbow lights running down my sides!
comb_jelly.detailed_script: I'm a Comb Jelly! They are the largest animals to swim using cilia (tiny hairs).

deep_sea_cucumber.name_script: Deep Sea Cucumber! Starts with D!
deep_sea_cucumber.simple_script: I crawl on the bottom of the ocean and eat the sand to clean it!
deep_sea_cucumber.detailed_script: I'm a Deep Sea Cucumber! Some can glow in the dark to warn predators.

zombie_worm.simple_script: I don't eat brains! I like to eat old bones I find on the sea floor.
zombie_worm.detailed_script: I'm a Zombie Worm! They dissolve bone using acid secreted from their skin.

ping_pong_tree_sponge.name_script: Ping Pong Tree Sponge! Starts with P!
ping_pong_tree_sponge.simple_script: I look like a weird tree with ping pong balls for leaves!
ping_pong_tree_sponge.detailed_script: I'm a Ping Pong Tree Sponge! Unlike most sponges, it is carnivorous and eats tiny shrimp.

tripod_fish.simple_script: I have three long stilts that let me stand on the mud without sinking!
tripod_fish.detailed_script: I'm a Tripod Fish! It stands facing the current to catch food drifting by.

dumbo_octopus.simple_script: I flap my ear-fins to fly through the water like a cartoon elephant!
dumbo_octopus.detailed_script: I'm a Dumbo Octopus! It swallows its prey whole instead of chewing.

faceless_cusk.simple_script: I have no face! My mouth is underneath my head so I can scoop up food.
faceless_cusk.detailed_script: I'm a Faceless Cusk! It was rediscovered in 2017 after being missing for 140 years.

abyssal_spiderfish.simple_script: I have super long fins that feel the water like spider legs!
abyssal_spiderfish.detailed_script: I'm a Abyssal Spiderfish! It uses its long fins to detect movement in pitch blackness.

sea_pig.simple_script: I am a squishy pink tube with little legs. I look like a wet piglet!
sea_pig.detailed_script: I'm a Sea Pig! They often gather in herds of hundreds on the sea floor.

ghost_shark.simple_script: I am also called a Chimaera. I have lines on my skin that look like stitches.
ghost_shark.detailed_script: I'm a Ghost Shark! Their skeleton is made of cartilage, not bone.

deep_sea_amphipod.name_script: Deep Sea Amphipod! Starts with D!
deep_sea_amphipod.simple_script: I am a giant version of a sand flea. I can be as big as your shoe!
deep_sea_amphipod.detailed_script: I'm a Deep Sea Amphipod! It can survive pressure that would crush a car.

glass_sponge.simple_script: My body is made of silica, which is the same stuff as glass windows!
glass_sponge.detailed_script: I'm a Glass Sponge! They can live for thousands of years.

grenadier_fish.simple_script: People call me a Rat-tail because my body tapers off into a long point.
grenadier_fish.detailed_script: I'm a Grenadier Fish! They have a huge head to house their sensory systems.

cusk_eel.simple_script: I am not a real eel, but I am very wiggly and slippery!
cusk_eel.detailed_script: I'm a Cusk Eel! The deepest fish ever recorded (27,000 ft) is a type of Cusk Eel.

snipe_eel.simple_script: My jaws curve away from each other so I can't close my mouth!
snipe_eel.detailed_script: I'm a Snipe Eel! It tangles its curved jaws into shrimp antennae to catch them.

sea_angel.simple_script: I am a swimming slug with little wings that make me look like an angel.
sea_angel.detailed_script: I'm a Sea Angel! Despite the name, they are voracious predators of Sea Butterflies.

deep_sea_jellyfish.name_script: Deep Sea Jellyfish! Starts with D!
deep_sea_jellyfish.simple_script: I glow red in the dark, which makes me invisible to other fish.
deep_sea_jellyfish.detailed_script: I'm a Deep Sea Jellyfish! Red light doesn't travel far underwater, so red animals look black.

basket_star.simple_script: I look like a mess of tangled tree roots wiggling in the water.
basket_star.detailed_script: I'm a Basket Star! It curls into a tight ball during the day to hide.

brisingid_starfish.simple_script: I have so many arms! I raise them up to catch food falling from above.
brisingid_starfish.detailed_script: I'm a Brisingid Starfish! It is named after 'Brisingamen', the necklace of the goddess Freya.

sea_pen.simple_script: I look like an old-fashioned feather pen stuck in the sand.
sea_pen.detailed_script: I'm a Sea Pen! They can uproot themselves and drift away if attacked.

acorn_worm.simple_script: I smell like medicine (iodine) to stop fish from eating me!
acorn_worm.detailed_script: I'm a Acorn Worm! They breathe through their skin.

siphonophore.simple_script: I am not one animal, but thousands of tiny clones holding hands!
siphonophore.detailed_script: I'm a Siphonophore! Each segment has a specific job: eating, swimming, or floating.

black_swallower.simple_script: I have a stretchy tummy that can hold a fish twice my size!
black_swallower.detailed_script: I'm a Black Swallower! Sometimes they swallow so much food they float to the surface.

lizardfish.simple_script: I have rows of sharp teeth, even on my tongue!
lizardfish.detailed_script: I'm a Lizardfish! They are one of the few deep sea fish that are hermaphrodites.

spookfish.simple_script: My head is see-through and my eyes can look up and down at the same time.
spookfish.detailed_script: I'm a Spookfish! It uses mirrors in its eyes to see, unlike any other animal.

anglerfish.simple_script: I have a fishing pole on my head with a glowing light to catch yummy fish.
anglerfish.detailed_script: I'm a Anglerfish! The light comes from glowing bacteria living inside the lure.

vampire_squid.simple_script: I wrap my red cape around myself when I am scared. I don't drink blood!
vampire_squid.detailed_script: I'm a Vampire Squid! It eats 'marine snow' (poop and dead scraps) falling from above.

giant_squid.simple_script: My eye is as big as a dinner plate! I battle sperm whales.
giant_squid.detailed_script: I'm a Giant Squid! It has the largest eyes in the animal kingdom.

gulper_eel.simple_script: My mouth is huge like a pelican! I can swallow things bigger than me.
gulper_eel.detailed_script: I'm a Gulper Eel! It has a glowing red light at the end of its tail.

goblin_shark.simple_script: I can shoot my jaw out of my face to grab a snack!
goblin_shark.detailed_script: I'm a Goblin Shark! Its long nose is full of electrical sensors.

blobfish.simple_script: I look sad and squishy because I have no muscles. I just float!
blobfish.detailed_script: I'm a Blobfish! Under pressure deep down, it looks like a normal fish.

lanternfish.simple_script: I have tiny lights all over my belly. There are billions of us!
lanternfish.detailed_script: I'm a Lanternfish! They account for 65% of all deep sea fish biomass.

hatchetfish.simple_script: I am as thin as a coin and look like a silver hatchet.
hatchetfish.detailed_script: I'm a Hatchetfish! They use 'counter-illumination' to hide their shadow from below.

viperfish.simple_script: My teeth are so long they curve over my face like a cage.
viperfish.detailed_script: I'm a Viperfish! It swims at high speed to impale prey on its teeth.

dragonfish.simple_script: I look scary, but I am very small—only the size of a banana!
dragonfish.detailed_script: I'm a Dragonfish! Some species produce red light, which acts like night-vision sniper scopes.

fangtooth.simple_script: I have the biggest teeth compared to my body size of any fish.
fangtooth.detailed_script: I'm a Fangtooth! It has special pockets in its brain so its teeth don't puncture its skull.

frilled_shark.simple_script: I look like an eel but I am a shark with 300 needle teeth.
frilled_shark.detailed_script: I'm a Frilled Shark! It is a 'living fossil' unchanged for 80 million years.

coffinfish.simple_script: I can puff up like a balloon and hold my breath to look big.
coffinfish.detailed_script: I'm a Coffinfish! It walks on the sea floor using its tiny fins.

barreleye.simple_script: My head is a clear bubble! The green balls inside are my eyes.
barreleye.detailed_script: I'm a Barreleye! Its eyes can rotate to look forward or straight up.

cookiecutter_shark.simple_script: I am small, but I take round bites out of big whales like a cookie cutter!
cookiecutter_shark.detailed_script: I'm a Cookiecutter Shark! It glows green to trick fish into coming close.

oarfish.simple_script: I am the longest bony fish in the world. Sailors used to think I was a sea serpent.
oarfish.detailed_script: I'm a Oarfish! It swims vertically (straight up) to spot food silhouettes.

big_red_jelly.name_script: Big Red Jelly! Starts with B!
big_red_jelly.simple_script: I am a giant red jellyfish that doesn't have stinging tentacles.
big_red_jelly.detailed_script: I'm a Big Red Jelly! Instead of stinging, it uses 'feeding arms' to grab prey.

colossal_squid.simple_script: I am heavier than the Giant Squid and have spinning hooks on my arms!
colossal_squid.detailed_script: I'm a Colossal Squid! It hunts by waiting in the dark, conserving energy for months.

six_gill_shark.simple_script: Most sharks have 5 gills, but I have 6! I move very slowly.
six_gill_shark.detailed_script: I'm a Six-Gill Shark! It is a scavenger that eats anything dead it finds.

wolffish.simple_script: I have strong teeth to crush seashells. My blood has natural antifreeze!
wolffish.detailed_script: I'm a Wolffish! They produce a natural protein that keeps their blood from freezing.

chimaera.simple_script: I have a venomous spine on my back and fly through the water.
chimaera.detailed_script: I'm a Chimaera! They detect magnetic fields to find buried clams.

stoplight_loosejaw.simple_script: I have a red light under my eye like a stoplight!
stoplight_loosejaw.detailed_script: I'm a Stoplight Loosejaw! Its jaw is hinged so openly it offers no water resistance when striking.

flashlight_fish.simple_script: I have a pocket of glowing light under my eye that I can blink on and off.
flashlight_fish.detailed_script: I'm a Flashlight Fish! It blinks the light to confuse predators while it escapes.

japanese_spider_crab.name_script: Japanese Spider Crab! Starts with J!
japanese_spider_crab.simple_script: I have the longest legs of any crab. I can step over a small car!
japanese_spider_crab.detailed_script: I'm a Japanese Spider Crab! It can live to be 100 years old.

nautilus.simple_script: I live in a beautiful spiral shell and swim backwards.
nautilus.detailed_script: I'm a Nautilus! It adjusts its buoyancy by pumping gas into its shell chambers.

sperm_whale.simple_script: I have the biggest brain of any animal and I dive super deep.
sperm_whale.detailed_script: I'm a Sperm Whale! It hunts using echolocation clicks that are louder than a jet engine.

beaked_whale.simple_script: I look like a dolphin but I have a beak like a goose.
beaked_whale.detailed_script: I'm a Beaked Whale! It holds the record for the deepest dive of any mammal (9,800 ft).

elephant_seal.simple_script: My nose looks like an elephant trunk! I make loud roaring noises.
elephant_seal.detailed_script: I'm a Elephant Seal! They can hold their breath for 2 hours.
